data.current_summary: Retrieve a list of orders for the authenticated shopper. Only one filter may be used at a time
data.current_description:
API Resellers
  • This endpoint does not support subaccounts and therefore API Resellers should not supply an X-Shopper-Id header
data.summary_suggestion: List orders for authenticated shopper with single filter
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of orders for the authenticated shopper. Supports filtering by order status, date range, or other criteria, but only one filter may be applied per request. Returns an OrderList object containing order summaries. Note: API Resellers should not supply an X-Shopper-Id header as this endpoint does not support subaccounts.
data.reasoning: Current description is incomplete and only mentions API Reseller constraints without explaining the operation's core functionality. Missing details about pagination, filter behavior, and return value structure. Enhanced description clarifies what the operation does, its constraints, expected output, and special considerations for different user types to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'get' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. data.current_description:
API Resellers
  • This endpoint does not support subaccounts and therefore API Resellers should not supply an X-Shopper-Id header
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve complete order details by order ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive details for a specific order identified by orderId, including line items, pricing, payment information, and fulfillment status. Returns a complete Order object with all associated data. Requires the orderId path parameter and authentication. Note: API Resellers should not supply an X-Shopper-Id header as this endpoint does not support subaccounts.
